short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract direct links to YouTube ads from debug data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Ad Link Extractor is a simple yet powerful tool that lets you save interesting YouTube ads for later viewing. Have you ever seen an engaging ad on YouTube but couldn't find it again? This extension solves that problem.
Key Features:

Simple 3-step process to capture any YouTube ad
Works with both skippable and non-skippable ads
Get direct links to ads you want to save
Clean, user-friendly interface
No registration required
Respects your privacy - no data collection

How It Works:

When you see an interesting ad on YouTube, right-click on the video player
Select "Copy Debug Info" from the context menu
Paste into the extension popup, and get an instant link to the ad

Perfect For:

Digital marketers studying successful ads
Researchers collecting ad examples
Anyone who wants to revisit interesting ads
Content creators seeking inspiration

Technical Details:

Lightweight and fast
Works offline - no internet required for processing
Compatible with all YouTube ad formats
No impact on YouTube's normal functionality

Privacy & Security:

No data collection or tracking
Processes everything locally on your device
No external servers involved
No permissions required beyond basic YouTube access

Updates & Support:

Regular updates to maintain compatibility
Quick bug fixes when needed
Responsive support for any issues

This extension is developed and maintained by CloseApp, focusing on creating useful tools that enhance your online experience while respecting your privacy.
Note: This extension is not affiliated with YouTube or Google. It's an independent tool designed to enhance your YouTube experience.
Get started now and never lose track of interesting YouTube ads again!
Tips for Best Use:

Make sure to capture the ad while it's playing
Works best with the latest version of Chrome
Keep the extension updated for optimal performance

For support or suggestions, visit closeapp.co.il
